tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tax_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  company_name VARCHAR(255), 
  revenue DECIMAL, 
  expenses DECIMAL, 
  tax_rate DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE tax_reports ( 
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  report_date DATE, 
  total_tax DECIMAL, 
  financial_data_id INT REFERENCES financial_data(id)
)
CREATE TABLE Reports (report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, report_type VARCHAR(255), generated_date TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE Taxpayers (taxpayer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, taxpayer_name VARCHAR(255), taxpayer_address VARCHAR(255), tax_id VARCHAR(20), tax_category VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE Expenses (expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY, taxpayer_id INT, expense_date DATE, expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), expense_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Incomes (income_id INT PRIMARY KEY, taxpayer_id INT, income_date DATE, income_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), income_source VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE TaxRates (tax_category VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY, tax_rate DECIMAL(5, 2), tax_description TEXT)
